00038 #define INT32 4
00039 
00040 // Points a variable value in a query
00041 #define QVARIABLE 0
00042 // Points out some error
00043 #define ERROR -1
00044 
00045 // Graph parsing constant
00046 enum ParsingType {
00047     SPO = 1,
00048     SOP,
00049     PSO,
00050     POS,
00051     OSP,
00052     OPS
00053 };
00054 
00055 static const char *parsingTypeStr[] = { "", "SPO","SOP","PSO","POS","OSP","OPS" }; 
00056 
00057 #define SPO 1
00058 #define SOP 2
00059 #define PSO 3
00060 #define POS 4
00061 #define OSP 5
00062 #define OPS 6
00063

00070 #define COMPACT 2

00072 #define K2TREE 4
00073

00075 #define VOC_SUBJECT 0
00076 #define VOC_PREDICATE 1
00077 #define VOC_OBJECT 2
